attributes.action: put a new law that states social services cannot put the child on an at risk register or into care without sufficient proof that the child is at major risk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i would like the prime minister to pass a new law stating that social services need to have more sufficient proof to suggest that a child is in danger before they either take the child into care or put them on a register.by proof i dont mean a phone call or letter suggesting the person 'thinks' the child is being hurt.
